snippet.title: Lil' Guardsman - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the demo on Steam now – https://store.steampowered.com/app/1924360/Lil_Guardsman/

Imagine you're a 12 year old, suddenly in charge of the guard shed at the castle gate, where you decide if elves, goblins and 100+ other characters should be admitted. It's a wonderful combination of deduction, narrative and puzzle games.

NEVER MISS OUT ON NEWS!
SUBSCRIBE: https://bit.ly/2IPMij9 
FOLLOW US: https://allmylinks.com/lilguardsman
